p.b:
FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS
SCHOOL CLOSURE AND LEARNING OPPORTUNITIES
FOR PARENTS, STUDENTS, AND COMMUNITY MEMBERS

div.p: The Novi Community School District is committed to sharing timely and accurate information as it becomes available. This Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ) document contains answers, as we know them right now, to some of your questions with additional guidance on closures, instruction, and resources available to support families, and COVID-19 updates. This is a living document and will continue to be updated as new and additional information is available.
